description: Next Door Studios' star Chuck came to Montreal for his first stripper's gig ever. I hooked up with him during the day and played strip pool on location at Stock bar. Such a gorgeous guy can be intimidating but he was so fun to hang out with, he quickly became a friend. I even had the privilege of performing muscle worship on the straight dude. Touching & caressing his muscular body made me hard in an instant. Then I asked him about his stripper's gig in Montreal. Chuck felt really good on stage to the point that he is considering coming back to perform again at Stock bar. As Markie More also told me after his shooting, Chuck had so much fun working with me that he agreed to come back for new adventures. Everybody, enjoy my new buddy Chuck!
title: Chuck
